article_title: Another September, another federal government shutdown?
article_text:
Sen. Ted Cruz and some House Republicans want to shut the government down

They vow to do so unless Planned Parenthood is defunded

It’s a bad idea for at least three reasons

article_metadata.news-keywords: government shutdown, Planned Parenthood, Ted Cruz, Paul
article_metadata.description: In “September,” Earth, Wind & Fire sang of “changing the minds of pretenders” and said there “never was a cloudy day.” That must have been the Septembers before Republicans regularly threatened to shut down the federal government.
article_metadata.title: Another September, another federal government shutdown? | The Charlotte Observer
